001package edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model;
002
003import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.R;
004import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.entity.Row;
005
006/**
007 * This is an {@link Enum} that holds a list of stitches. In knitting, a stitch is the basic
008 * building block. A {@link Row} is made up of many stitches, and this {@link Enum} represents all
009 * the stitches my app uses at the moment. Think of this class like a stitch dictionary.
010 */
011public enum Stitch {
012
013  KNIT("K", R.drawable.knit),
014  PURL("P", R.drawable.purl),
015  KNIT_2_TOGETHER("K2tog", R.drawable.knit_2_together),
016  SLIP_SLIP_KNIT("SSK", R.drawable.slip_slip_knit),
017  PURL_2_TOGETHER("P2tog", R.drawable.purl_2_together),
018  SLIP_SLIP_PURL("SSP", R.drawable.slip_slip_purl),
019  YARN_OVER("YO", R.drawable.yarn_over),
020  MAKE_1_RIGHT("M1R", R.drawable.make_1_right),
021  MAKE_1_LEFT("M1L", R.drawable.make_1_left),
022  KNIT_3_TOGETHER("K3tog", R.drawable.knit_3_together),
023  PURL_3_TOGETHER("P3tog", R.drawable.purl_3_together),
024  CENTER_DOUBLE_DECREASE("CDD", R.drawable.center_double_decrease);
025
026  private final String shorthandAlphaNum;
027  private final int image;
028
029  /**
030   * This constructor initializes all the fields and their assets.
031   *
032   * @param shorthandAlphaNum {@link String} shorthand for the stitch.
033   * @param drawableId        {@link int} representing the image for the symbolic shorthand for the
034   *                          stitch.
035   */
036  Stitch(String shorthandAlphaNum, int drawableId) {
037    this.shorthandAlphaNum = shorthandAlphaNum;
038    this.image = drawableId;
039  }
040
041  /**
042   * This getter returns the alphanumeric shorthand for the stitches.
043   *
044   * @return shorthandAlphaNum
045   */
046  public String shorthandAlphaNum() {
047    return shorthandAlphaNum;
048  }
049
050  /**
051   * This getter returns the drawable image that will show the symbolic shorthand for the stitches.
052   *
053   * @return image
054   */
055  public int getImage() {
056    return image;
057  }
058}
